title: Lesson 1 Quiz
description: This is the quiz that focuses on data types

questions.question: Oh no! There's a bird flying above! What should you do?

Oops! You've come across 4 more seashells!
What kind of data type can you make with 4 sea shells?

You ran into a statue of Pelé!
What kind of data type is "Pelé"?

Oh no you ran into a statue of __!
What kind of data type would you use to say that it is
true that you ran into a statue?
